case.state: Sss, sss, sss. I am Myriam Scuttlebutt, a senior in the judge course!
I am Myriam Scuttlebutt. A future judge, and currently leader of the newspaper club.
Why am I hiding? Sss, sss, sss. To hide from people like you, of course!
I guess this is what a female version of a sausage party feels like, Misty.
Great, a prosecutor. I can pretend this is a court case.
Oh, a defense attorney. I can treat this like some trial.
What's the prize anyways? Does the winner confess their love?
This game is filled with beans to spill.
As an aspiring judge, I am always prepared.
AAAAAAHK!
Slide in ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~. Put them in the holes.
By my request, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I order ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Just give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I don't know, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I'll have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Don't give me more crap.
Sss, sss, sss, sss, sss!
Call me a cheat, but this hand 100% real.
Would you believe I hide cards under this box? Take a guess.
Sss, sss, sss. My hand is better than all you losers'.
No need to worry. Now, which person looks the most interesting to analyze?
I think the chills in my feet give me good luck.
Sss, sss, sss. I bet these cards will beat these idiots.
All of you suck! Get ready to see what I have.
I've got some good cards. Let's see if I can guess who will have to strip.
I don't know what's a good or bad hand at this point.
How many of you guys here would let me win?
I'm going to hope you guys will lose in less than four rounds. Maybe two.
Ah! Look away from me!
Kahk-kahk-kahk-kahk! You didn't see anything!
You saw nothing! NOTHING!
Ahk! I'm covered! Just stop looking at me!
Kahk-kahk! I don't have my camera anymore! What am I supposed to do now?
Kahk-kahk-kahk. I swear, this better be a damn good hand.
I'm ready to take all of you down! Who wants some of this?
You're going to be whining in melancholy once you see this hand.
My senses tell me one of you losers has a shitty hand.
I am supposed to be catching my scoop while all of you lose. Can we stick with that agenda?
I can sense some idiots here. Someone must've made a bad swap.
Sss, sss, sss. I am always a step ahead of everyone else.
Kahk-kahk. I wish mine were better.
This better not disrupt my investigation.
This is all for my scoop. I should remember that.
Maybe my hand is good. Even if it's bad, I'm not even close to showing what's underneath.
Sss, sss, sss. I love unpredictable games, but only if there's no consequences for me.
I think my cards can beat at least one moron.
I wish I had my shoes. Gives me elevation to look at others' hands.
Is this hand any good? I'm about to find out in a possibly horrifying way.
I hate to say this, but this game is really stressing me out now. Maybe because I'm completely naked right now.
I think this is a good hand. One slip up, and it's over.
Kahk-kahk. With my streak of bad luck so far, I'm going to doubt this hand.
I'm doing a quick calculation of my chances of winning with this hand.
Someone better be stupid for one turn. I'm serious, I can pay you.
I know my identity is more important, but please, I don't want to lose any more clothes.
If I keep losing, I'm not going to be able to make a flawless photo shoot.
You didn't see me, and you still won't be seeing me.
I'm not stupid here. Even if I am, you won't know what this idiot looks like.
Quit looking at me. Look at my cards and tell me they're good at least.
I'm surrounded by people who can see my naked body, and now probably want to see who I am.
The end will justify the means.
Kahk-kahk! Are you serious?
Hey! This is not what I wanted!
Kaaaaaaaahk!
Kahk-kahk. My hand isn't bad. Just wait and see.
I'm going to solitary mode for a bit.
Kahk-kahk. I've taken too much clothing off already, don't you think?
Ahk! These cards must get out of my box.
I'm going to do an inventory check. Be right back.
I am not participating in what is happening next.
What did you do last night Myriam? Oh I just had my cover blown, got my ass handed in a card game, and fucked myself in front of strangers. The usual.
Kahk-kahk-kahk-kahk!
Maybe I should take off my bandages and kneepads. Nah, I don't want to be "that" girl.
Kahk-kahk-kahk-kahk-kahk!
Kahk-kahk-kahk. I will fucking end somebody here.
I wish I had a spare deck under here.
What!? This game is really pissing me off now.
Kahk-kahk-kahk. I'm building up a flame under here.
Disturb me when I have calmed down from looking at this hand.
Ahk! I'm not going to do this again!
I will fight someone for a better hand.
Kahk-kahk. You will not look at me again. Don't even watch me lose.
If someone is staring at me, I will kick you very hard.
I have light shining on me, and that light is being absorbed into people's corneas, and implanted in their brains, which can be brought up again at any point.
Kahk-kahk. At least you will know that I was not cheating under the box.
You don't talk much, but I like your way of thinking. I enjoy stupid ideas.
You should really talk, because seeing you do stuff like this in silence throws me off.
A zombie schoolgirl! That's insane! Should I continue to be frightened? Or are you one of those harmless slow moving zombies?
Sss, sss, sss. It's good to know some people are very kind and sensible in games like this.
Despite your slightly menacing look, I appreciate your honesty with clothes classification.
I can ask your friends for their opinions? My article needs some opposing views.
You're asking me, Tomoko? What could possibly give the impression that I'm an asshole?
Tomoko, I'll put my answer in weeb language. Watashi tsundere, desu.
Kahk-kahk, I'm stuck smelling that cigarette without my box. Put that out, or you will be leaving with cigarette burns
Sss, sss, sss. Revy, are you secretly a guy? The overly manly attitude reminds me of a "boy" at my school.
Revy, why do you have to be so rude? Being nice is the first to getting a boyfriend or girlfriend, you know.
You sound like you hate a lot of people for no reason. Maybe I should do something to piss you off on pupose.
I hope my hand is better than yours, Revy. I just want to see you pissed off while stripping.
Are you here to show off, Jura, or are you experiencing some mid-life crisis?
How old are you in Earth years? Is it like that one move where one hour on another planet is ten years on Earth? Perhaps the other way around?
You sound like the type of woman who wants to sound young and sexy despite looking fifty. That's pretty sad.
You've been eyeing ~Player~, Natsuki. Let me help you out. ~Player~, Natsuki wants to do "you know what" stuff with you.
You are old enough to be here, right Natsuki? Your parents would punish you if they found out.
Do you read tabloids, Natsuki? I hope my tabloids count as literature. I'll even draw doodles so it's like a manga.
I hope you don't intend to use that knife, Chara. It will break if you attempt to penetrate my box.
What's your plan, Chara? I will cut you down before you you can lay a finger on me.
What are you trying to prove by killing everyone, Chara? You must've had a shitty life.
I hope I get classified as those cheap AI characters, Neptune. Then I would know know how great I am in this game.
How well do you handle losing badly in video games? I want to know if it would be worth my time beating you in online games?
Anna, are you one of those annoying spoiled rich kids? I need to know if I should avoid you or leech from you.
I wouldn't flaunt the value of your clothes and money, Anna. Some people here can blackmail you. Sss, sss, sss, sss.
Ugh, you're so loud, Anna. I don't want to buy headphones just to not hear your annoying voice.
I can't decide whether playing against a complete slut makes the game easy and fun, or boring and ruins the excitement for me.
I probably shouldn't say rude things to Moon. She most likely has a humiliation kink.
I imagine Moon was the kid at school who throws a tantrum when they don't win a boardgame. Except instead throwing a tantrum, she's trying to whore herself out.
I'm glad I'm taking the judge course. Now I can talk back to prosecutors like Franziska all I want.
Franziska, I will be the one who judges who is right and wrong. Sss, sss, sss. And you can't do a damn thing about it.
Franziska, I wouldn't go crazy with that whip. I'm possibly a masochist. Sss, sss, sss.
Unlike some other judges, I will actually penalize those who act rude and improper. For example, Franziska von Karma.
Franziska, have you played a game against Phoenix. That would be two unbeatable things from one person. Sss, sss, sss.
Do you have any good evidence, Mia? I will judge whether it shows a contradiction to my cards. Sss, sss, sss.
Should I take the side of other players here, and penalize Mia for no reason?
I will be a fair judge, Mia, though I'm just going to play very well, and hope every hand will be yours.
Do you have a good defense? Maybe a good jury to back you up?
This hand will surely overcast your evidence, Mia.
You may be an Ultimate Photographer, Mahiru, but you have no skills in journalism unlike me. Photos and journalism make a great combo.
I hope you won't take the same photos as me, Mahiru, unless you want to go to war with me.
We can compare photos after the game, Mahiru. Though, I might save some of your photos if they catch something I missed.
I assume you don't take any pictures of students in embarrassing acts. Sss, sss, sss. That would be a waste of talent.
I can see through you, Kokichi. I know when someone is lying. I am a future judge, after all.
You act all mighty and evil like the "Ultimate Supreme Leader" you are, but my judicial power has absolute power.
Do you have any evil intentions in this game, Kokichi? Sss, sss, sss. I doubt they won't work on me.
Most people who want absolute power are usually idiots. Sss, sss, sss. I am seeing it right now, Kokichi.
To be honest ~name~, right now has to be one of the most embarrassing moments for me.
Any time in which I don't have my box in public, so right now is one of my most embarrassing moments.
Little lies have never hurt anyone. Sss, sss, sss. Maybe not directly injured or caused catastrophic distress.
As an upcoming judge, I take lying verying seriously. But I'm not a judge yet, aren't I? Sss, sss, sss.
Sss, sss, sss. Depends on what you classify as porn to me. Watching certain non-sexual things excite me.
I recorded a lot of things that constitute as porn. Sss, sss, sss. It literally is my job to watch it.
What do you mean by that, Jessie? I should cut a hole behind my box? Why would I need that?
I don't have a "backdoor" on my box. I guess I could always flip it around. I sometimes do that for fake outs.
Oh, pick me! Me, me, me! I want to become a pilot! Only if I don't have to take a test, and am free to fly anywhere.
Hey, I want to be a pilot. One condition: I don't want to hear any orders from you, Meia.
I wonder if Revy has a grudge on me. I'll need to get out of here quick after this game.
Don't even think about destroying my box for your amusement. I'm talking to you, Revy.
Kahk-kahk! I'm voluntarily joined to get a good scoop here, Revy, not to score some love! You really think I'm that desperate for love?
Sss, sss, sss, sss. You're not going to be happy when I take this off.
So be it. I'm like 75% covered anyways.
Whatever, I will still be covered after this.
Not a problem, I have some other things under here.
Kahk-kahk-kahk-kahk-kahk! There must be something else I'm wearing...
Kahk-kahk-kahk! I still hope no one saw my face.
Kahk-kahk. Can we call for a recess or something?
Kahk! I must be exposed for a bit?
Whatever. I have things under here.
Kahk-kahk. I suppose I can give you guys something.
You're making me run out of decisions. What next?
I thought I would be better than this. Don't make fun of me.
Ahk. My box isn't full of accessories, you know.
Kahk-kahk-kahk. I don't even have my bra anymore.
Kahk-kahk. This game went a lot better in my head.
Kahk-kahk-kahk-kahk! One moment. I know I brought some extra things...
Kahk-kahk-kahk! Fine.
I am very, very annoyed.
I'll give you morons a show.
Kahk-kahk. Well, you can guess what I'm taking off next.
Again? Seriously? And I'm falling behind already? Cut me a break!
KAAAHK!
Kahk-kahk-kahk! Give me time to look at what I have.
Kahk-kahk-kahk-kahk! I keep losing. I know I have something left, like...
I've got my tie under here. Uh, hold on one moment, please.
Excuse me one sec, as I carefully remove this tie.
I'm taking my socks off.
Obviously, my socks come off next.
Without shoes, I'll be quieter anyways.
I'm still undercover, so taking off my shoes will help with being sneaky in my investigation.
Just give me a second. I need to unstrap here, and...
I'll take my skirt off... Ahk! I guess my whole dress.
KAAAAHK!
Kahk-kahk. My panties are all I have left.
Kahk-kahk. I order everyone to stop looking for ten seconds.
Sss, sss, sss. Like nothing happened.
Sss, sss, sss. I'm a walking box of mysteries.
Sss, sss, sss. They should call me the silent protagonist.
You morons shouldn't expect a thing from me.
If you want my appreciation, please start losing more.
Voila! Like a masked magician.
Just like those box magic acts!
Take a guess of my size from this.
Any creeps here want this?
Sss, sss, sss. As long as I remain semi-anonymous, that's all what matters.
So you can see my panties, but you can't see my face.
Sss, sss, sss, sss. I am not embarrassed so easily.
When you are in the nude, it's better to cover your face. Sss, sss, sss.
I know I have knee pads, but I keep them on for my own comfort.
As long as you can't see my face, I don't care what you guys look at.
Stare all you like. Just don't look at my face.
Pit, more like, you play like shit.
I've always imagined my guardian angel was a perverted idiot. Are you my angel?
Be an angel, and show something devilish. Sss, sss, sss.
You wear such an interesting outfit, ~name~. What sort of organization were you part of?
If you really have truly evil intentions, you shouldn't be so obvious about it, ~name~.
Come on, ~name~. They're waiting, and I lost my patience.
Sss, sss, sss, sss. Don't be as dopey as you look, ~name~.
Are you persistent, or a pervert? What do you want the media to say?
Guilty!
At least it's not me this time. Plus, it's a boy.
For a stripping game, you would think the ratio of guys to girls would be 5 to 1.
I may have slipped up, but not on the same level as you.
I am curious of what ~name~ will be taking off. Maybe he's a naughty boy.
I might as well watch ~name~ humiliate himself.
Sss, sss, sss. We're all playing around anyways, so I should enjoy watching your defeat.
I like it when you take off your ~clothing~, ~name~. Do friends compliment each other like that?
Finally, a change in pace. Everyone, a boy is stripping.
Don't change your stripping strats because of me. That means, don't make up accessories.
Brighten this game with something good. I'm out of the dark anyways.
What will ~name~ take off? I'm hope nothing too lewd. That would upset me without my camera.
Sss, sss, sss. I'm quite stripped down. Are you thinking about joining me?
Guys usually have less clothes, right? That's my guess from what I've witnessed in the past.
I'm quite good at this game. I just have slightly higher than average luck.
I can't do anything but watch you strip to the end.
Anything interesting you still have on? Maybe something I can borrow during this moment?
Sss, sss, sss. You probably are the "innocent" type of girl.
Throwing tantrums will only last until you take something off.
Don't you want to get ~player~'s attention? Sss, sss, sss.
There should be a manga about this. Stubborn schoolgirl exposed as a stripper.
Why would you want to be here anyways, ~name~. So Earth can be doomed as soon as you lose?
You're a space commander or whatever. Your choice of what to pick.
Sometimes I pretend I'm in outerspace under here. It's smarter to use a cheap solution than, say, getting some space degree.
Everyone loves exposed cleavage. Press your arms together for me.
Take something off, and I shall claim it as my own treasure.
You're like half dressed already. I'm taking pics of whatever I see.
Sss, sss, sss. A good pirate never gets called out for such acts of failure.
Take something off, but use some cool magic. Something big and explosive.
Isn't bad luck a common hex? Actually, I don't think anyone casted it on you.
You have so much power, and don't want to use it for cheating? Such a moron.
Can you try that spell which disintegrates all of your clothes?
A witch student in training? This should be a good to watch.
How many of your friends know you're here?
Sss, sss, sss. Who are the drama queens at your academy who would love to know about this?
If I were a witch, being a journalist would be a lot more interesting, you know.
I guess deep down and to the surface, you're a blond bimbo.
Don't threaten me with the massive alien jugs. Just take something off.
You really write all my articles yourself, ~name~.
You look like a NEET. Are you sure you can strip?
If you want to hide and be pervy, use a box like me.
Sss, sss, sss. Not so powerful without a computer.
I love to see a transformation. I know how this goes down.
A lot of people have seen you in ecchi scenarios. This should be no problem.
Stripping is basically your superpower. Go ahead and get stronger.
Hmm, what rumors should I spread at your school, ~name~?
You must've done it on purpose, though not because you wanted to get lewd.
According to exhibitionism laws, you are free to take off anything.
Sss, sss, sss. Can I be your senpai who tells you what to do?
With your knowledge of mostly hentai, this will be a pretty easy game.
Sss, sss, sss. Did that school ever test for brain damage?
Going to disability school is hard enough. Why come here?
Do you plan taking off some of the darkness?
If you wanted to be covered in gloominess, I'd buy a box, and never go mobile.
Is ~player~ into goth girls? You better give ~player~ what he wants, ~name~.
Will your dark magic constitute of deep embarrassment?
What more do we expect from ~name~? She's a slut for ~player~.
I shall title this article ~name~'s failure of seducing ~player~.
Maybe you should've joined a more practical club. For instance, card games, and journalism.
If you don't remove something interesting, I will have you removed from the game, er, court.
If you want to blow off steam, take something off.
Sss, sss, sss. People fight better undressed, ~name~.
If you want justice, you must play dirty, ~name~.
As a fighter in such revealing clothes, I'm ready to catch a wardrobe malfunction.
Sss, sss, sss. I knew people in the military were idiots.
I swear, I'm not responsible for your loss.
Does your sadistic nature match your masochistic side?
Sss, sss, sss. So eager to lose. Are you like this when fighting too?
Be turned on by my winning hand, not myself.
I'll pay you with something big if you lose more. Sss, sss, sss.
Sss, sss, sss. I could see why you stuck with the "actress" profession.
What's the big deal of you stripping here? I can find pornstars stripping for free online.
Can I join in this shooting? I will be the dominant one.
Captain, you have an issue. It can only be solved by stripping though.
Sss, sss, sss. I bet you weren't even drunk.
Of course, someone unfamiliar with our planet would lose so easily.
Sss, sss, sss. I wouldn't trust you saving this planet, ~name~.
Are you actually part of a band, or is it an act for a stripping career, ~name~?
You look as if someone is trying to kill you, ~name~. Relax, we're only ganging up on you through playing the game.
I hope you won't count your limbs as your clothes.
I wonder who was the person person that killed you, ~name~. I can be the judge for that case.
If you wearing something like a flapper dress from the 1920s, I would've guessed you were a zombie in the first place.
There has been rumors about you, ~name~. Are you hiding some specific outfit under those clothes?
Some people said they know a girl who looks like you, except wearing a mask. I'm just saying I should've worn one.
Do you have something heinous to show off? I know the gossip. You've been hanging out with bad boys.
Geez, it's your turn to strip, ~name~
I would steal your camera, but it's probably not as high quality as mine. I hope what I said is true.
You could take some strip shots of me, ~name~. You just have to wait for me to lose.
I've got a word that you gave your panties to a boy at school. It would be funny to see you do it again.
Did I hear you right? You came here just to lose?
Now that I know losing is your intention, this doesn't make me winning as fun.
Should I still take a picture of you stripping? I have a feeling you have enough footage of yourself on the Internet.
"It's not that I like watching you strip or anything." Sss, sss, sss.
Does this make you happy, or pissed off? Even I can't tell what is truthful.
Sss, sss, sss. I think we're going to see ~name~ stripping a lot in this game.
What an airhead. This game is over for ~name~ from the start.
Do you even know how to play, ~name~?
You must be adapted to these scenarios. Have lots of people taken your photo in public?
Take off something big. You don't even need encouragement.
Why even come here with a lot of stuff if you want to act so perverted?
What a great way to make friends. Meeting up with perverts who want to see your body.
Was this the last resort on your game events list?
Please tell me you're also super shy.
I won't go easy on you just because you're cute, you know. It only makes me want to see you uncovered more.
Should I encourage ~name~, or should I feel bad for her target?
I'm glad I'm not a boy. Even I wouldn't handle this type of obsession.
I hope your tsundere act is now a diversion from me.
Did you really mean to lose for me?
I understand how you feel now.
I wouldn't be surprised if you take off something small.
Don't kill me, ~name~, okay?
I don't know how you manage to strip with dignity.
I'm not a real pervert, not even in private. How do you not feel frightened, ~name~?
What goes on in the mind of ~name~? Must be a psychotic world of sexual stuff.
Kahk-kahk. I hate the idea of losing to a complete idiot.
Am I seriously doing worse than that ditz ~name~.
Do I need to be truthful? Just tell the press I'm open minded for anything.
You don't know what kind of things I have under here. Sss, sss, sss.
What the hell kind of question is that? Do you think I am some sort of evil girl?
If my daddy issues were kinky, then I would say I have Stockholm Syndrome.
Usually I'm the type to ask these questions. I want your answer first.
What's it going to be, ~name~? Will it be something scandalous?
There are some boys who would love to see you wearing less, ~name~. Can I help make your choice?
Such a foolish move. Quick, get yourself in character.
I'm holding you contempt in court.
I am here for a "special" undercover investigation.
Sss, sss, sss, sss. What a ditz you are, ~name~.
I can't be accused of being a slut. That's for me to do to you.
Take some of the unwanted attention away from me.
You never know what someone will take off next.
I'm not quite in the mood to watch, especially without my camera.
How sad for you. Oh I'm sorry, I'm the only who would get upset over that.
I don't have my camera. You're free to take off whatever, ~name~.
Yes, be the trash that you are, ~name~.
Sss, sss, sss. I'm not giving up just yet.
Oh thank god. I'll try not to forget this, ~name~.
Maybe, just maybe, I will not lose.
So, what will you be taking off, ~name~?
Sss, sss, sss. The difference between me and you is that you panic about how you will look naked.
Did you take it for the team, ~name~? I never even asked, especially without paying.
I'm still in the game! I knew my hand was good.
Yes, lose for me, ~name~. Do it for my own sake.
~name~ is stripping? At least she isn't joining in with me.
Don't try to take too much attention. The slutty attention sure, not the personal attention.
Kahk-kahk! Is this newsworthy? Should I take a photo? SOMEONE TELL ME WHAT TO DO!
Kahk-kahk! I can't even take a picture of this moment! Not that I want to in this state
What's that? A tie? Should I wear one to be sexier?
With me out of the game, the chances of getting a tie are much lower. I am amazed!
You could take that blindfold off the whole time? Wait, you could actually see through it? I'm confused.
Shouldn't that be the first thing to take off? It would've made things much easier in this game for you.
Oh, nevermind, I guess you aren't a perv. But a little purjery in my notes isn't bad, right?
Don't care, don't care, don't care.
I can get a pic like this anywhere. Nothing exciting about that.
Any possession from a man is filled with secrets and clues to something more. Does your ~clothing~ hold a dark past?
Sss, sss, sss, sss. Stall all you want. You will break once you take off the real stuff.
Who knew actions like taking off your ~clothing~ is enough to make me angry.
Are you doing this on purpose just to make me feel dumb?
I thought guys don't go with the whole extra glamour.
If it saves the awkwardness of having a guy show off something big in front of me like this, I'm fine.
You really had that on the whole time, or are you just being an ass?
Who knew guys needed a lot of stuff to look attractive, err, nice looking.
Once I'm a full-time judge, I'll get to decide what you take off.
The end will justify the means. And that means, your actions will lead to my wanted fate.
Sss, sss, sss. You better watch out next time, ~name~.
I'd never be mad at a guy taking off a ~clothing~, especially if it can be weaponized.
If you'd like to make a donation, insert your ~clothing~ through one of my holes.
Kahk-kahk. That must be the last accessory you're wearing.
Kahk-kahk. I don't mean to sound rude, but entertain the crowd next time.
I still want to win and not have people look at me, so don't taunt me like this.
I could borrow ~clothing.ifplural(those|that)~ ~clothing~. It's not for using it on myself though.
Take off something better next time for my sake, and probably your sake.
I'm just taking a picture of you, ~name~. No particular reason, but I can show you the result in my next article. Sss, sss, sss.
You have management? Someone's paying you to be here?
It's scary to think that one could be so sex obsessed that they need actual workers to suppress someone.
Hey, this will not make a good article!
Kahk-kahk! You almost made me waste my photo storage!
I should've known. I should percieve what you are wearing.
I know everyone is doing their best to stay dressed, but that ruins my entertainment.
I would say unfair, except I did the exact same thing earlier.
I'd like to confiscate ~clothing.ifplural(those|that)~ ~clothing~.
Kahk-kahk-kahk. I was hoping you'd do something stupid.
I'm just saying, I'm pretty naked right now, and you take off that?
You've got to be kidding me.
Are you sure that ~clothing~ isn't part of something on your other clothes?
Oh come on, that doesn't count.
You really couldn't keep ~clothing.ifplural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ on until the end?
Kahk-kahk. This is more humiliating for me than to you.
Are you serious? This is humiliating to me.
Is this some last minute decision, or were you too stupid to not notice it?
